title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Designing Blended E-Learning Strategies for Healthcare Workforce Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in public health and basic e-learning system proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Prioritize e-learning elements by applying difficulty-usefulness analysis in instructional design and material organization
Implement a blended learning design that improves five core elements: assignments, quizzes, feedback, discussions, and resource links
Develop interactive strategies to increase engagement in small learner groups using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
